function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of automatic operable windows or skylights","Impact":"Reduced natural ventilation and increased risk of stagnant air","Mitigation":"Install automatic operable windows or skylights, or implement alternative natural ventilation methods","Technologies":"Automatic window and skylight controls, ventilation monitoring systems","People":"Occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owner, facility management"},{"Description":"Limited reporting of window and skylight position","Impact":"Reduced ability to monitor natural ventilation and its impact on indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Implement window and skylight position sensors and monitoring systems","Technologies":"Window and skylight position sensors, IoT monitoring systems","People":"Occupants, maintenance staff, building management","Owner":"Building owner, facility management"},{"Description":"Lack of smart windows","Impact":"Missed opportunity for energy-efficient and responsive light and heat control","Mitigation":"Install smart windows with adjustable tint or light filtering capabilities","Technologies":"Smart window technology, IoT integration","People":"Occupants, energy efficiency specialists","Owner":"Building owner, sustainability team"}]}
